title: Polenta pork
description: A simple, hearty dish of baked polenta layered with spicy sausage, bacon and cheese that will feed a family.
ingredients: 12 rashers thick rindless smoked streaky bacon
600g/1lb 5oz skinless spicy chilli sausages or soft cooking chorizo
1 tbsp flaked sea salt, plus extra to season
50g/1¾oz butter, cubed, plus extra to grease
